name: Nico Robin

trigger.text: Play up to one cost 3 or less yellow character from your hand.

text: On Play: If your opponent has 3 or more life cards, trash up to one of the top cards of your opponent's life. Trigger: Play up to one cost 3 or less yellow character from your hand.
